name: Honeywell
brand_description: A leading Nigerian producer of flour, pasta, and other food products.

name: Golden Penny
brand_description: A popular brand known for its high-quality flour, pasta, and semolina.

name: IRS
brand_description: IRS specializes in quality rice and other grains, sourced to deliver the best taste and texture for your meals.

name: Mamagold
brand_description: Mamagold provides high-quality flour and pasta products, perfect for baking and creating delicious meals.

name: Activa
brand_description: Activa provides high-quality cooking oils that are perfect for a variety of culinary applications.

name: Whippy
brand_description: Whippy offers delicious and creamy spreads, perfect for bread and other snacks.

name: Terra
brand_description: Terra is known for its uniquely flavored seasoning cubes and cooking oils that elevate everyday cooking.

name: Laziz
brand_description: Laziz offers a range of delicious and flavorful seasonings and oils that bring authentic Nigerian flavors to your cooking.

name: Vitali
brand_description: Vitali is a trusted choice for creamy, delicious margarine, perfect for spreading, baking, and cooking.

name: Kings
brand_description: Kings is renowned for its premium vegetable oils, trusted by families and businesses for its purity and cooking performance.

name: Mamador
brand_description: Mamador is a premium brand of cooking oils, known for its heart-healthy benefits and superior quality.

name: Mr Chef
brand_description: Mr Chef provides a range of seasoning products that add a rich and savory taste to any dish.

name: Sonia
brand_description: Sonia is a versatile brand offering everything from tomato paste to seasonings, a staple in many Nigerian kitchens.

name: Dano
brand_description: Dano is a leading dairy brand, providing nutritious and creamy milk products for families across Nigeria.

name: Minimie
brand_description: Minimie offers a variety of snacks and noodles, loved for their flavor and crunch.

name: Mimee
brand_description: Mimee is a popular brand of instant noodles, offering a quick, convenient, and tasty meal option for everyone.
